Text: isn't the bluray coming on sept 10th ???
I Just need to know ...Is this Bluray or the same HD Version because Bluray is going to release in 10 Sep ?

For those who might be wondering, this is the real deal. The quality is awesome v9/10 and a10/10. The only minor problem is that the dark scenes have slightly more noticeable pixelation than i would like to have but still, they are very slight and not immediately noticeable to the eye (I am saying this when i have downloaded only 68% of the movie so could be something with the player itself). The commentary tracks are a very welcome addition. Kudos to the uploader for getting us the bluray rip even before the official availability. 

Anyone else beginning to download may wanna give a chance to the open matte version by the same uploader. 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7593834/Titanic.1997.720p.OPEN.MATTE.BluRay.x264-HDChina_%5BPublicHD%5D
Personally I would download both of them as the open matte version has more of screen space and is not cut off to the academy ratio as this one.

@phinazh The subtitles (multiple) are embedded in the video file itself and can be optionally turned on by an appropriate setting in your player.
